mapper.select: SELECT mr.*, pth.track_no, prn.track_head_id FROM produce_material_receive mr LEFT JOIN produce_request_note prn ON mr.aply_num = prn.request_note_number LEFT JOIN produce_track_head pth ON prn.track_head_id = pth.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT mr.CREATE_TIME FROM produce_material_receive mr LEFT JOIN produce_request_note prn ON mr.aply_num = prn.request_note_number LEFT JOIN produce_track_head pth ON prn.track_head_id = pth.id WHERE pth.tenant_id = #{tenant_id} ORDER BY mr.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 1
